adrFormatAddress: 5 E 57th St floor 11, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: I had a great experience at Eye Design.  Laura who was my eyebrow technician was wonderful.  She explained everything to me and the whole process to remove an eyebrow mistake and it only took a few minutes to finish!  I am definitely coming back there to get my powder brows!

text.text: I had a great experience at Eye Design.  Laura who was my eyebrow technician was wonderful.  She explained everything to me and the whole process to remove an eyebrow mistake and it only took a few minutes to finish!  I am definitely coming back there to get my powder brows!

originalText.text: Laura, my advance technician is very professional and friendly. She listened to the style I want, & gave her input. She also took her time in drawing the eyebrow style and made sure I agree before starting. I liked that she applied numbing solution frequently, without the need for me to request, which made the procedure painless. Lastly, the result is stunning and natural looking! Overall a great experience. Will book with her again in the future for touchups.

originalText.text: Maria, my lash professional, is always relaxed and happy-she put me at ease.  Maria was efficient, effective, and always professional; I am always happy and extremely satisfied with her work on my lashes.  I will continue to have Maria serve my lashes with her ‘magic!’ I always receive lots of compliments thanks to her wonderful work.  Thank you, Maria and thank you EYEDESIGN. Forever thankful and grateful!!! (PS:  I’ll add photo soon)…

originalText.text: I had my microblading procedure done here by Daniela a few years ago and I do not recommend her or the pigments used by eye design.. at least not on Asian skin. Not only did my eyebrows fade red everyone I recommended at the time also faded red, which I felt so bad about. However I do stand by their laser tattoo removal which has after 5-6 sessions removed all the redness and the pigments from my skin. The removal process is not worth getting the microblading done here. The strokes done by Daniela at the time were deep, uneven, and has left scarring long after the pigment was faded off. I’ve had guys comment about how bad my brows were when I had it done here. Pigments are not supposed to fade red and artists that I’ve went to after successfully lasering off the poor work done by Daniela have used pigments that to this day still looks like my natural hair color and has not faded red in any way shape or form.

originalText.text: I just went for my annual touch up at Eye Design NYC. As always I am happy and satisfied with the results. I did have a small discrepancy, I called them and the issue was resolved literally within minutes. I’m pleased and very satisfied with the great service that Laura L. and Eye Design NYC provides.
